description: This file defines a minimal API client function 'apiRequest' using fetch, for making HTTP requests with configurable method, headers, and body, and handling JSON responses and errors.

methods.name: apiRequest(path, { method = "GET", headers = {}, body } = {})
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request to a specified path with options, utilizing fetch, and processes the response including error handling and content type parsing.

ctags.name: apiRequest
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiRequest(path, { method = "GET", headers = {}, body } = {}) {$/
